content:
Based on the execution logs and map data, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore into plates
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0) processing iron ore into plates

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position (4.0, 4.0) processing copper ore into plates
- Furnace 2 at position (6.0, 4.0) processing copper ore into plates

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-2.5, 24.0), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at position (4.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler (fluid system 3921)
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to steam engine (fluid system 3922)
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures (poles at positions (8.5,2.5), (8.5,6.5), (8.5,10.5), (8.5,14.5), (8.5,18.5), (6.5,24.5))

### Research Lab
- Lab at position (10.5, 0.5) conducting research
- Currently researching Electronics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisite Errors
- Check technology prerequisites before setting research
- Automation must be completed before Electronics can be researched
- Automation-2 requires Electronics as prerequisite

### Resource Management Errors
- Monitor coal levels - multiple instances of running out of coal for furnaces and boiler
- Keep track of iron ore inventory before attempting to reload furnaces

### Lab Insertion Errors
- Check lab capacity before attempting to insert science packs
- Extract items from lab if inventory is full before adding new packs

### Research Progress Checking Errors
- Verify research is actually in progress before checking progress
- Research progress cannot be checked when no research is active
